Body:
orig = [[1.0, 1.0 / 2, 1.0 / 3, 1.0 / 4], [1.0 / 9, 1.0 / 10, 1.0 / 11, 1.0 /
    12]]
l1 = range(1, 6)
l2 = [(10 * 0.2 + i * 0.25) for i in range(1, 6)]
d = {'1': l1, '2': l2}
df = pd.DataFrame(d)
ret = daily_returns(df)
assert all(abs(ret['1'].values - orig[0]) <= 1e-15)
assert all(abs(ret['2'].values - orig[1]) <= 1e-15)
